properties.description: Mapping columns with if/then logic and categorization

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Client Name} as string,
		{Engagement Title} as string,
		{SFDC Opp #} as string,
		Platform as string,
		{Onsite Location} as string,
		{Signed FA/MSA} as string,
		{Existing Customer} as string,
		Products as string,
		{Cloud Ops Customer} as string,
		{Cloud Platform} as string,
		{Desired Start Date} as string,
		{Desired End Date} as string,
		{Proposal Link} as string,
		{Second Doc Link} as string,
		{LoE Created By} as string,
		{LoE Created Date} as string,
		{Pricing Basis} as string,
		{Project Details} as double,
		{Desired Duration} as string,
		{LoE Duration Weeks} as string,
		{Project Summary (Consider: Account, Background, Location, Resourcing, Key Dates etc)} as string,
		{__index_level_0__} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> loerawtransform
loerawtransform select(mapColumn(
		client_name = {Client Name},
		sfdc_num = {SFDC Opp #},
		platform = Platform,
		desired_start_date = {Desired Start Date},
		desired_duration = {Desired Duration},
		loe_duration_weeks = {LoE Duration Weeks}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
